Faeroes.text:

In southeast, cyclonic 3 to 5, becoming northeasterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 until later. In northwest, northeasterly 7 to severe gale 9.

Weather
In southeast, rain, wintry showers later. In northwest, rain, then snow showers.
